author: jorgeae17
title: Al-Baari. The Creator.
description: Blockchain and multiple applications of Cardano, and this new era of technology, are foreign for the majority of the globe.

author: akashthyagaraja
title: Save Farmers in India Initiative!
description: Farm Laws passed increase privatization and middlemen profits by curbing Farmer to consumer transactions. Farmers livelihood compromised.

author: A
title: L10N - localisation
description: community + communication should start in the low cost high value - online - (through the best medium - video) then offline.

author: Thiago Nunes
title: LCC in Brazil for Growth and Adopt.
description: Lack of optimization in community communication during Cardano Growth Phase, we need more content translation and core members are overload.

author: Q U A S A R
title: Fund Matching from C-Foundation
description: Cardano Foundation is looking for ways to create a stronger impact in local areas and also reinvigorate the Ambassador program.

author: Dan Verowski
title: Strengthen local communities
description: How to generate more active Cardano participants, that effect local change?Many don't know how to use a Cardano wallet & need face2face help

author: WADA(West Africa Decentralized Alliance)
title: Local Centers in West Africa
description: WADA's Blockchain Resource Hubs for Solution Design have no formal relationship with the Cardano Foundation (CF).

author: drakemonroe
title: Catalyst Legal Fund
description: If we are doing our job, we'll be pushing new boundaries and proposers need a legal point of contact.

author: Oleksii
title: ADA in CIS exchangers/online stores
description: Every user that spends $1000 on cryptocurrency purchases lost about $15-35 as a stock exchange commission https://imgur.com/a/Lk7oHga

author: jo allum
title: Local Venture Activation Centres
description: Good people do good but most don't get support, connections and mentorship vital to starting and sustainably scaling their aspirations.

author: Ryan Morrison
title: Cardano Center in Europe
description: There is no place in Europe where developers, entrepreneurs and other community members can meet to learn and work on Cardano projects.

author: Tomas Garro
title: Cardano spanish training programs
description: There are no educational resources for spanish speakers who want to develop and grow their Cardano local community.

author: brian.bxter
title: Charity Casino
description: People want to make change but don't have the skills, finances or time to do it. How can we help hubs flourish?

author: Rasmus Moeller Pedersen
title: Cardano LCC - Community Outreach DK
description: Blockchain & cryptocurrencies generates a rampant increase in public interest, but there is no formal or educational institutions available

author: uc_banax
title: Poor energy supply/infrastructures
description: The problem of providing power supply to ease innovation and provide modern facilities to local communities. Eradicate poverty in local area

author: Johan
title: Education/Developer center - Sweden
description: There is low adoption and knowledge about blockchain solutions in Sweden.

author: kyave13
title: Training program NOA-NEA Argentina.
description: In Argentina, the ignorance of the Cardano ecosystem is complete with more than 2 million potential users of the network.

author: Bullish Dumpling
title: Cardano China Info Hub
description: The Chinese Cardano community has limited access to accurate Cardano-related information which led to low awareness and mass misconception.

author: Matias Falcone
title: ALDEA, the Latin America DAO
description: There is currently no platform or framework for the Cardano Community to discuss, prioritize and solve Latin American issues in Spanish.

author: F
title: Adriatic EU Community Center
description: Lack of a physical place for Catalyst Community to meet, socialize and represent Cardano network.

author: Arturo Pozuelo Calvet
title: Global sustainable transport
description: The continuous advance of society causes every day more climate problems, the planet dies and Cardano can help save it 😀

author: mani mejia
title: Voluntary.Gold: a community network
description: Worldwide cardano community lacks a decentralized platform for collaboration, leadership development, social interaction, & incentivisation.

author: Async
title: Help University/hacker association
description: An incentive to use Cardano has to be created for groups that are creating and experimenting with new technologies.

author: Denison Luz
title: University Cardano Research Program
description: Creating new Cardano education and learning centres and labs is a big challenge which involves many aspects like location and equipments

author: fsamvura
title: Cardano Adoption in D.R. of Congo
description: Bitcoin scams have led the government to take a negative stance on crypto currencies that result in bans and discourage blockchain adoption.
